{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content##正文卷.|正文.|VIP卷.|默认卷.|卷_|VIP章节.|免费章节.|章节目录.|最新章节.|[\(（【].*?[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字].*?[】）\)]}}•{{@@[property$=update_time]@content##\s.*}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

loginUrl:
<js>
function browserLogin() {
  try {
    java.startBrowserAwait(
      "https://qidian.com", 
      "登录"
    )
  } catch (e) {}
  let ywkey = cookie.getKey("qidian.com", "ywkey")
  let ywguid = cookie.getKey("qidian.com", "ywguid")
  java.toast(ywkey)
  cookie.removeCookie("qidian.com")
  let uInfo = java.ajax("https://qqapp.qidian.com/ajax/bookShelf/list?pageNum=1&pageSize=20&_csrfToken=," + JSON.stringify({
    headers: {
      'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 8.1.0; MI PAD 4 Build/OPM1.171019.019; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/90.0.4430.226 KsWebView/1.8.90.612 (rel) Safari/537.36 NetType/wifi Language/zh miniProgram/1.60.0 KUAISHOU/11.5.30.31599 aegon/3.32.2',
      Connection: 'Keep-Alive',
      platformType: 'android',
      Referer: 'https://miniapi.ksapisrv.com/',
      'content-type': 'application/json',
      Cookie: `ywguid=${ywguid}; ywkey=${ywkey}`
    }
  }))
  uInfo = JSON.parse(uInfo)
  putLoginHeader({
      guid: ywguid,
      key: ywkey,
      uid: uInfo.data.user.userId
  })
}

function login() {}

function tokenLogin() {
  if (source.getLoginInfoMap() == null) {
    java.toast("未获取到LoginInfoMap，请尝试重新打开登录UI再按一遍")
  }
  let ywguid = source.getLoginInfoMap()["ywguid"]
  let ywkey = source.getLoginInfoMap()["ywkey"]
  let uInfo = java.ajax("https://qqapp.qidian.com/ajax/bookShelf/list?pageNum=1&pageSize=20&_csrfToken=," + JSON.stringify({
    headers: {
      'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 8.1.0; MI PAD 4 Build/OPM1.171019.019; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/90.0.4430.226 KsWebView/1.8.90.612 (rel) Safari/537.36 NetType/wifi Language/zh miniProgram/1.60.0 KUAISHOU/11.5.30.31599 aegon/3.32.2',
      Connection: 'Keep-Alive',
      platformType: 'android',
      Referer: 'https://miniapi.ksapisrv.com/',
      'content-type': 'application/json',
      Cookie: `ywguid=${ywguid}; ywkey=${ywkey}`
    }
  }))
  uInfo = JSON.parse(uInfo)
  putLoginHeader({
    guid: ywguid,
    key: ywkey,
    uid: uInfo.data.user.userId
  })
  cookie.removeCookie("qidian.com")
  java.toast("凭据保存成功")
}

function fixInformation() {
  let h = getLoginHeader()
  if (!Packages.android.text.TextUtils.isEmpty(h.uid)) {
    java.toast("您的登录信息是完整的，不需要补全")
    return
  }
  let ywkey = h.key
  let ywguid = h.guid
  let uInfo = java.ajax("https://qqapp.qidian.com/ajax/bookShelf/list?pageNum=1&pageSize=20&_csrfToken=," + JSON.stringify({
    headers: {
      'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 8.1.0; MI PAD 4 Build/OPM1.171019.019; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/90.0.4430.226 KsWebView/1.8.90.612 (rel) Safari/537.36 NetType/wifi Language/zh miniProgram/1.60.0 KUAISHOU/11.5.30.31599 aegon/3.32.2',
      Connection: 'Keep-Alive',
      platformType: 'android',
      Referer: 'https://miniapi.ksapisrv.com/',
      'content-type': 'application/json',
      Cookie: `ywguid=${ywguid}; ywkey=${ywkey}`
    }
  }))
  uInfo = JSON.parse(uInfo)
  putLoginHeader({
    guid: ywguid,
    key: ywkey,
    uid: uInfo.data.user.userId
  })
  java.toast("成功")
  cookie.removeCookie("qidian.com")
}

function proxyExcWrapper(fun) {
  try {
    fun()
  } catch (e) {
    java.log(e.toString() + e.stack)
  }
}

function tutorial() {
  java.toast("如果你是群里原书源用户，请点一下获取信息")
}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: Author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var Regs = [/bookId=(\d+)/i, /\.com\D+?\/(\d+)/i, /(\d+)/i];
var bookId = "";
for (let Reg of Regs) {
    let mat = baseUrl.match(Reg);
    if (mat) {
        bookId = mat[1];
        break;
    }
}
java.ajax(QDSign("v2/bookdetail/get", [
    "bookId=" + bookId
]))
</js>

ruleContent.content: let info = JSON.parse(java.hexDecodeToString(result)) let content = "" let header = getLoginHeader() switch (info.source) { case "qd": let bid = java.hexDecodeToString(java.ajax(book.tocUrl)) let cid = info.cid if (info.isVip) { let url = `https://ksapp.qidian.com/ajax/chapter/getInfo?debug=1&bookId=${bid}&chapterId=${cid}&_csrfToken,` + JSON.stringify({ headers: { 'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 8.1.0; MI PAD 4 Build/OPM1.171019.019; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/90.0.4430.226 KsWebView/1.8.90.612 (rel) Safari/537.36 NetType/wifi Language/zh miniProgram/1.60.0 KUAISHOU/11.5.30.31599 aegon/3.32.2', Connection: 'Keep-Alive', 'platformType': 'android', Referer: 'https://miniapi.ksapisrv.com/', 'content-type': 'application/json', Cookie: `ywguid=${header.guid}; ywkey=${header.key}` } }) let body = JSON.parse(java.log(java.ajax(url))).data let user = body.user body = body.chapterInfo content = body.content if (body.vipStatus && !body.limitFree && !body.isBuy) { content += ("\n=============\n试读结束，继续阅读请 [购买]\n本章价格: " + body.price + "点") } } else { let request = QDSign("v2/bookcontent/safegetcontent", [ "bookId=" + bid, "chapterId=" + cid ], "", true) let body = getBytes(request.url, request.headers) let decrypt = dContentQD(cid, body) let raw = JSON.parse(decrypt) let cArr = raw.Content.split("\r\n") let blocks = {} for (let i of raw.Blocks) { blocks[i.Sort] = i } for (let i = 0; i < cArr.length; i++) { content += cArr[i] + "\n" if (blocks[i + 1] && blocks[i + 1].Type == "image") content += `\n` } } } content

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;
            
var document = JsDom.parse(src);
            
// 获取包含<li>元素的<div>元素
var divs = document.select('ul.list > div');

// 将divs转换为数组以便排序
var divArray = [];
for (var i = 0; i < divs.size(); i++) {
    divArray.push(divs.get(i));
}

// 按照data-id属性对divArray进行排序
divArray.sort(function(a, b) {
    var pageA = parseInt(a.attr('data-id'), 10);
    var pageB = parseInt(b.attr('data-id'), 10);
    return pageA - pageB;
});

var list = [];
// 遍历排序后的divArray
for (var i = 0; i < divArray.length; i++) {
    var div = divArray[i];
    var dataId = div.attr('data-id');
    // 获取当前div下的所有<li>元素
    var lis = div.select('li');
    for (var j = 0; j < lis.size(); j++) {
        var li = lis.get(j);
        var a = li.select('a').first();
        if (a != null) {
            list.push({
                text: a.text(),
                id: dataId, // 使用data-id属性
                url: a.attr('href')
            });
        }
    }
}

//java.log(JSON.stringify(list));
list;
</js>

category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

searchUrl:
https://m.hjbook.com/search.php?keyword={{key}}&submit=
@js:
u="https://m.hjbook.com/search.php?keyword=submit="
loc=java.get(u,{})
lo=String(loc.headers("location"||"Location")).replace(/\[(.*)\]/,"$1")
code=loc.statusCode()
if(code>=301){
uu=source.key+lo
java.log(uu)
re=java.ajax(uu)
java.log(uu)
na=re.match(/" name="(.*)" v/)[1]
va=re.match(/value="(.*)"\/\>/)[1]
no=re.match(/bute\("value","(.*)"\),d/)[1]
bd=`${na}=${va}&nonce=${no}`
java.log(bd)
url=source.key+"/search.php?keyword={{key}}&submit=,"+JSON.stringify({
  "body": bd,
  "method": "POST",

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;
            
var document = JsDom.parse(src);
            
// 获取包含<li>元素的<div>元素
var divs = document.select('ul.list > div');

// 将divs转换为数组以便排序
var divArray = [];
for (var i = 0; i < divs.size(); i++) {
    divArray.push(divs.get(i));
}

// 按照data-id属性对divArray进行排序
divArray.sort(function(a, b) {
    var pageA = parseInt(a.attr('data-id'), 10);
    var pageB = parseInt(b.attr('data-id'), 10);
    return pageA - pageB;
});

var list = [];
// 遍历排序后的divArray
for (var i = 0; i < divArray.length; i++) {
    var div = divArray[i];
    var dataId = div.attr('data-id');
    // 获取当前div下的所有<li>元素
    var lis = div.select('li');
    for (var j = 0; j < lis.size(); j++) {
        var li = lis.get(j);
        var a = li.select('a').first();
        if (a != null) {
            list.push({
                text: a.text(),
                id: dataId, // 使用data-id属性
                url: a.attr('href')
            });
        }
    }
}

//java.log(JSON.stringify(list));
list;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: $.author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
result = JSON.parse(decode(result)).result.book;
//result = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(result));

burl=source.getKey().match(/([^#]*)/)[1];
id = result.id;

source_url= burl + `/cdn/book/source/${id}.html`;
$ =java.ajax(source_url);
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
$ = JSON.parse(decode($)).result.list;
n=0;//默认选择源
v=String(book.getVariable("custom"));
x=v.match(/^\d+$/)?v:n;
x=parseInt(x)<$.length?x:n;

result.new_title = $[x].new_title;

if($.length>1){
		y = '\n📌使用说明： 根据序号设置书籍变量来切换来源(默认0)，若书籍ID为0 (9x除外)，则为第三方网站。\n🎯当前源：序号🔺'+x+'🔻【'+$[x].name+'】'+(x==0?' (默认)':'');
for(i in $){
		y += '\n❤序号🔺'+i+'🔻【'+$[i].name+'】\n书籍ID：'+$[i].internal_book_id+'\n选用率：'+$[i].show_text+' \n源地址： '+$[i].chapter_list_url+'\n最新章节： '+$[i].new_title;
	}
result.description += y
}

try{ book_id=$[x].internal_book_id; }
 catch(e) { book_id = id;}
 
 if(x==0&&book_id==0){ 
 	book_id = id;
 	java.put('book_id',book_id);
 	result.tocUrl = `/cdn/book/chapterList/${book_id}.html`;
 }
else if(x!=0&&book_id==0) {
	 tUrl = $[x].chapter_list_url;
	 result.tocUrl = tUrl+"," + JSON.stringify({"headers":{"Referer": tUrl}});
	}
else if(book_id!=0){ 
	java.put('book_id',book_id);
		result.tocUrl = `/cdn/book/chapterList/${book_id}.html`;
	}

result = JSON.stringify(result);
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: $.name

ruleSearch.author: $.author

ruleSearch.name: $.name

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
if(baseUrl.match(/cdn\/book\/chapterList/)){
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
data = JSON.parse(decode(result)).result.list;
length = data.length;
chapterList = [];
for(var i = 0; i < length; i ++){
	name = "🏮〖"+data[i].name+"〗🏮";
	chapterList.push({
			text: name,
			href: null,
			volume: true
	})	
	data[i].list.forEach(($) => {						
		text = $.name;
		id = $.id;
		book_id = java.get('book_id');
		//book_id = baseUrl.match(/\/(\d+).html/)[1];
    href = `/cdn/book/content/${book_id}/${id}.html`;   
    chapterList.push({
			text: text,
			href: href	
	})
	})	
	}
chapterList
}
else{
	chapterList = [];
	datas = java.getElement("dd@a").toArray();
	//java.log(JSON.stringify(chapterList));
	for (var i = 0; i < datas.length; i++) {
    text = datas[i].text();
			hre = baseUrl.split(',')[0]+datas[i].attr("href");
			d=String(hre).split('\/');
list=[];
d.forEach((s, index)=>{ 
	 if (list.indexOf(s) == -1) {
 	   list.push(s);      }
		
		});
		href = list.toString().replace(/,/g,"/");
						
     chapterList.push({
		 	 text: text,
		  	 href: href	
      	})            
   };
	chapterList
	}
</js>

<js>
var data = JSON.parse(result).data;
var pageCount = Math.ceil(data.total/10) || 1;

for(var i = 0; i <pageCount; i++){
  var index = list[i]+1;
  list[i] = {title:'第00' + index +'页', url: baseUrl.split('&')[0] + '&type=all&page=' + index + '&pageSize=10&sort_field=create_time&sort_value=desc'};
}
list;
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var sk=java.get("sk");
var su=source.getKey();
var v=source.getVariable();
var so=/s.php/.test(baseUrl);
if(so){
	var bu=baseUrl.match(/^(.+)\/s.php/)[1];
if(bu!=su&&bu!=v){
	source.setVariable(bu);
	java.toast("地址变动，重新搜索加载！")
	result=java.ajax(baseUrl+`,{
		"body": "s=${String(sk)}",
		"method": "POST"}`);
		}
	}else{result=result}
	result;
</js>
.bd li

	li+="\n";
	}
	li;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var bes = result.match(/PHA\+[A-Za-z0-9+\/]+={0,2}/g);
//java.log(String(bes))
if (!bes) {
    var ml = java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
    var txt = java.getString("#txt@html");
    java.longToast("正文解密失败，转为webView动态加载。");
} else {
var result = [];
for (var i = 0; i < bes.length; i++) {
    // 遍历数组，使用阅读内置Base64解码方法
    var bsej = java.base64Decode(bes[i]);
    var txtt = String(bsej);
    result.push(txtt);
      }
	var txt = result.join('\n');
}
txt;
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  //showjname设置章节名显示卷名true or false
  let obj = {showjname: false}
  let $ = JSON.parse(String(result))
  let array = []
  $.volumes.forEach((booklet) => {
  	  java.put('jname',booklet.name)
    array.push({ 
    	    name:'◆◇'+String(booklet.name)+'◇◆',
    	    voltype:true
    	 })
    booklet.chapters.forEach((chapter) => {
href='http://api.ieasou.com/api/bookapp/chargeChapter.m?a=1&autoBuy=0&cid=eef_easou_book&version=002&os=android&udid=1c5b2618a57a0848e2510649dc1e03896f462284&appverion=1122&ch=blf1298_12337_001&session_id=-nEvkqSq_9ZyORN5OoVOOzJ&dzh=1&scp=0&appid=10001&utype=0&rtype=3&pushid=f97b7f81a269472c07708277b7c40b4f&ptype=5&gender=0&userInitPay=3&birt=1658424532472&instime=1658424529924&instId=1658424529924&chType=3&bidType=0&recSw=1&appType=0&gid='+java.get('gid')+'&nid='+chapter.nid+'&sort='+chapter.sort+'&gsort=0&sgsort=0&sequence=4&chapter_name='+chapter.chapter_name
      array.push({
        name: !java.get('jname')?chapter.chapter_name:((obj.showjname?'※'+java.get('jname')+'※ ':'').padStart(3,''))+chapter.chapter_name,
        url: href,
        time:"本章字数:"+String(chapter.wordCount)+"字",
        voltype:false
      })
    })
  })
  array
</js>

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

@js:result

.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')

.replace(/\[|。/,'')

<js>
  //showjname设置章节名显示卷名true or false
  let obj = {showjname: false}
  let $ = JSON.parse(String(result))
  let array = []
  $.volumes.forEach((booklet) => {
  	  java.put('jname',booklet.name)
    array.push({ 
    	    name:'◆◇'+String(booklet.name)+'◇◆',
    	    voltype:true
    	 })
    booklet.chapters.forEach((chapter) => {
href='http://api.ieasou.com/api/bookapp/chargeChapter.m?a=1&autoBuy=0&cid=eef_easou_book&version=002&os=android&udid=1c5b2618a57a0848e2510649dc1e03896f462284&appverion=1122&ch=blf1298_12337_001&session_id=-nEvkqSq_9ZyORN5OoVOOzJ&dzh=1&scp=0&appid=10001&utype=0&rtype=3&pushid=f97b7f81a269472c07708277b7c40b4f&ptype=5&gender=0&userInitPay=3&birt=1658424532472&instime=1658424529924&instId=1658424529924&chType=3&bidType=0&recSw=1&appType=0&gid='+java.get('gid')+'&nid='+chapter.nid+'&sort='+chapter.sort+'&gsort=0&sgsort=0&sequence=4&chapter_name='+chapter.chapter_name
      array.push({
        name: !java.get('jname')?chapter.chapter_name:((obj.showjname?'※'+java.get('jname')+'※ ':'').padStart(3,''))+chapter.chapter_name,
        url: href,
        time:"本章字数:"+String(chapter.wordCount)+"字",
        voltype:false
      })
    })
  })
  array
</js>

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

<js>
var bookId=java.get('bid');
var encryptKey="37e81a9d8f02596e1b895d07c171d5c9",user_id="8000000",timestamp=parseInt((new Date).getTime()/1e3);
var o=bookId+timestamp+user_id+encryptKey;
var sign=java.md5Encode(o);
var list={'turl':'https://ocean.shuqireader.com/api/bcspub/qswebapi/book/chapterlist?_=&bookId='+bookId+'&user_id=8000000&sign='+sign+'&timestamp='+timestamp};list
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  //showjname设置章节名显示卷名true or false
  let obj = {showjname: false}
  let $ = JSON.parse(String(result))
  let array = []
  $.volumes.forEach((booklet) => {
  	  java.put('jname',booklet.name)
    array.push({ 
    	    name:'◆◇'+String(booklet.name)+'◇◆',
    	    voltype:true
    	 })
    booklet.chapters.forEach((chapter) => {
href='http://api.ieasou.com/api/bookapp/chargeChapter.m?a=1&autoBuy=0&cid=eef_easou_book&version=002&os=android&udid=1c5b2618a57a0848e2510649dc1e03896f462284&appverion=1122&ch=blf1298_12337_001&session_id=-nEvkqSq_9ZyORN5OoVOOzJ&dzh=1&scp=0&appid=10001&utype=0&rtype=3&pushid=f97b7f81a269472c07708277b7c40b4f&ptype=5&gender=0&userInitPay=3&birt=1658424532472&instime=1658424529924&instId=1658424529924&chType=3&bidType=0&recSw=1&appType=0&gid='+java.get('gid')+'&nid='+chapter.nid+'&sort='+chapter.sort+'&gsort=0&sgsort=0&sequence=4&chapter_name='+chapter.chapter_name
      array.push({
        name: !java.get('jname')?chapter.chapter_name:((obj.showjname?'※'+java.get('jname')+'※ ':'').padStart(3,''))+chapter.chapter_name,
        url: href,
        time:"本章字数:"+String(chapter.wordCount)+"字",
        voltype:false
      })
    })
  })
  array
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
url = source.getVariable()!=""?source.getVariable():source.key;
response = java.get(url,{"User-Agent": "Mobile"})
if(/^30/.test(response.statusCode())){
	 source.setVariable(response.header("Location"));
	 url = source.getVariable()
	}

surl = url+"search";
header = {
  "headers": {"Referer":surl},
  "method": "POST",
  "body": "kw={{key}}&_token="+java.ajax(url).match(/=\"_token\" value=\"(.*?)"/)[1]
}
surl+","+JSON.stringify(header)
</js>

                    i19 ^= 192;
                }

                cArr[i14] = cArr2[b15];
                var i24 = i23 + 1;

                var i25 = i24 + 1;

                cArr[i25] = cArr2[b12 & 63];

        if (i10 === 8) {

jsLib:
time = Math.floor(Date.now() / 1000).toString()

function getSign (key, type, num) {
  const { java } = this
  const secret = 'magic2019'
  let baseString

  switch (type) {
    case 's':
      baseString = `channel=ft0001&gid=2&nci=1&nsc=0&query=${java.encodeURI(key)}&timestamp=${time}&secret=${secret}`
      break
    case 't':
      baseString = `bid=${key}&channel=ft0001&gid=1&nci=1&nsc=1&timestamp=${time}&secret=${secret}`
      break
    case 'c':
      baseString = `bid=${key}&channel=ft0001&chapterid=${num}&gid=2&nci=1&nsc=1&timestamp=${time}&secret=${secret}`
      break
    default:
      throw new Error('Invalid type')
  }

  return java.md5Encode(baseString).toUpperCase()
}

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;
            
var document = JsDom.parse(src);
            
// 获取包含<li>元素的<div>元素
var divs = document.select('ul.list > div');

// 将divs转换为数组以便排序
var divArray = [];
for (var i = 0; i < divs.size(); i++) {
    divArray.push(divs.get(i));
}

// 按照data-id属性对divArray进行排序
divArray.sort(function(a, b) {
    var pageA = parseInt(a.attr('data-id'), 10);
    var pageB = parseInt(b.attr('data-id'), 10);
    return pageA - pageB;
});

var list = [];
// 遍历排序后的divArray
for (var i = 0; i < divArray.length; i++) {
    var div = divArray[i];
    var dataId = div.attr('data-id');
    // 获取当前div下的所有<li>元素
    var lis = div.select('li');
    for (var j = 0; j < lis.size(); j++) {
        var li = lis.get(j);
        var a = li.select('a').first();
        if (a != null) {
            list.push({
                text: a.text(),
                id: dataId, // 使用data-id属性
                url: a.attr('href')
            });
        }
    }
}

java.log(JSON.stringify(list));
list;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
try {

function d(a, b) {
b = java.md5Encode(b);
var d = b.substring(0, 16);
var e = b.substring(16);
return java.aesBase64DecodeToString(a,e,"AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding",d)
}

result=eval(src.match(/(d\("[\s\S]+"\))\);/)[1])
} catch(err) {

result=result
}

a=escape(result).replace(/%u200[ABDCEF]/g,"")
unescape(a)

</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
temp=result
R=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(temp).select(".BCsectionTwo-top-chapter a")
c=[]
R.forEach(r=>{
	i=String(r.attr('href')).replace(/.+\/\d+\/(\d+)\.html/,`$1`)
	//java.log(i)
	c.push({
		name:r.text(),
		url:r.attr('href'),
		index:i
		})
	})
try{
	o=temp.match(/originalOrder[^=]*=[^\[]*\[([^\]]+)\]/)[1]
	o=o.split(",")
	c.sort((a,b)=>o[c.indexOf(a)]-o[c.indexOf(b)])
	}catch (err){
		java.log(err)
		c.sort((a,b)=>a.index-b.index)
		}
	result=c
</js>

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

exploreUrl:
<js>
sort=[];
	push=(title,url,type,fp)=>sort.push({
		title: title,
		url: url,
		style: {
				layout_flexGrow: fp,
				layout_flexBasisPercent: type
			}
	});
	u="https://apiv2hans.aixdzs.com/sort"
	xx=(a,b)=>{
		return `list,{"method": "POST","body":'{"bookTypeId":"${a}","type": "${b}","pageNum": "{{page}}"}'}`;
	}
	fls = JSON.parse(java.post(u,'',{}).body());
	push("最新",'',1,1)
	for(f of fls.data.allType){
		push(f.categoryName,u+xx(f.bookTypeId,1),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("大热",'',1,1)
	for(l of fls.data.allType){
		push(l.categoryName,u+xx(l.bookTypeId,2),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	//完本:3
	JSON.stringify(sort);
</js>

$.lastChapter
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

	h += x.charAt(r);
}
a=String(Math.round(new Date()));
sha = s + h + a + h;
sha1 = java.digestHex(sha,'SHA-1');

b = baseUrl.match(/"chapterId":(\d+),"bookId":"(\d+)"/)
u=source.getKey();
url = u + "/chapter/content,";
post=`{
  "method": "POST",
  "body":'{"chapterId": ${b[1]},"bookId":"${b[2]}"}',
  "headers":{"checkSumDTO":'{"appid":"ixdzs","checksum":"${sha1}","curtime":"${a}","nonce":"${h}"}'}
}`

result = java.ajax(url+post);
</js>$.data.chapter.chapterContent
